lore: The people of Rodia exterminated Waspid hives without control, so the authorities banned such activities under penalty of imprisonment.\n\nWaspid Hiveleaders have the decisive voice in the Waspid armies, both when attacking and when defending the hive. They help coordinate the actions of the other Waspids with their buzzes, movements and pheromones, turning them into a single warrior that dances a deadly dance.
menagerieDialog: (It's lazing around, buzzing its wings every so often to let your other creatures know it's still alive.)
(It buzzes around impatiently as if to wonder what's taking you so long to finish your business here.)
(It buzzes around your head which causes you to freeze in place until it gets bored and leaves you alone.)
(In truth, the Waspid race serves no purpose to the greater good of Rodia. They are an angry, mean, and selfish race that live only for themselves. And to sting people.)
(It's rapidly buzzing its wings to try to shake off the dirt and debris it picked up in the last realm you visited.)
name: Waspid Hiveleader
